reuters.title: FIRSTCORP <FCR> INCREASES REPURCHASE PROGRAM
reuters.body: Firstcorp Inc said its board has increased the maximum number of Class A shares in its repurchase program to 250,000 from 200,000 shares. The program was first adopted in June 1986 and provided for a maximum of 100,000 shares to be repurchased through June 1987. In June 1986, the company increased the shares to 200,000 and extended the period to end September 1987. Reuter 
